name: Good Morning Hoi An
description: Hoi An is undoubtedly one of the most beautiful places in Vietnam but sometimes, the swarm of tourists, the heat and the bikes can get a little much. If you love photography and want to experience a REAL Hoian’s life without tourists, Good Morning Hoi An is a must do. You can find good spots for good pictures everywhere since during the day there are a lot of tourists and locals walking the streets. As traders begin to wake up and prepare for the day ahead, the market buzzes with activity and the town begin to come alive.
